description:
Yes! You can use NixOS as your homelab server distro! In this video, I try it out for the first time and learn along the way about firewall, package installation, and the configuration file.
Learn More: https://techhut.tv/nixos-best-server-os-setup/

title: NixOS as a SERVER Linux Distro!?
